QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT t.OBSERVATION_ID ,t.PERSON_ID ,t.OBSERVATION_CONCEPT_ID as CONCEPT_ID ,t.OBSERVATION_DATE as START_DATE ,t.OBSERVATION_TYPE_CONCEPT_ID as TYPE_CONCEPT_ID FROM {sc}.OBSERVATION as t JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND t.PERSON_ID = ch.PERSON_ID order by t.PERSON_ID, t.OBSERVATION_ID
